item.title: Tutorial
item.description: This tutorial will walk through KubeDL training, KubeDL model and KubeDL Serving concepts. Install KubeDL Follow the instructions to install KubeDL. Go → Setup docker credential The docker credential is required for KubeDL model to store the model image. This step is not needed if you don’t use KubeDL model. This tutorial will use it. Follow the setup instruction to setup docker credential. Go → Run a job to train a model This example trains a mnist model using distributed TensorFlow.
